name: Seiko 5 Sports SKX Watch 42.5mm
description:
This Seiko 5 Sports “SKX” GMT 42.5mm remains true to the brand’s dedication to durability and reliability.
It features a blue dial with luminescent hands and indices, a date window at 3 o’clock, and an additional red GMT hand that allows for tracking an additional timezone.
Housed in a stainless steel case with a bicolour bezel that separates day and night hours and fitted on a rice steel bracelet that is iconic to the SKX.
This SSK003K model is powered by the 4R34 Calibre offering up to 41 hours power reserve.

name: Lorus Classic RS973CX9 - Ditur
description: Lorus Classic RS973CX9 is a practical accessory for men. It will look great with both casual and elegant outfits. This monochrome watch features a popular battery-powered quartz movement. The watch features a steel case in navy blue and a precise movement. The bracelet is made of high-quality stainless steel. It can be easily taken off thanks to a comfortable clasp. A water resistance of 100 meters means the watch can be worn when swimming and freediving. Lorus RS973CX9 is covered by the manufacturers warranty and is packed in the original box.

name: Lorus Classic Mens RH929HX9 - RIP
description: We are pleased to add this Lorus ‘Classic’ (RH939HX9) quartz watch to our offerings. This piece features a bold, easy to read dial encased in a stainless-steel body and bracelet. With a date complication, 5 bar water resistance and a striking dual-toned dial, the understated simplicity and classic aesthetic of this piece will lend themselves to a truly fantastic everyday wear.

name: Lorus Classic RS973CX9 - Ditur
description: The watch is equipped with a solid case made of stainless steel. A silver bracelet made of steel is easy to use and perfectly matches other elements of the watch. The easy-to-read black dial is covered with a reliable mineral crystal, which is resistant to impacts and scratches

name: Fossil FS4839 Unisex Grant Small
description: This Fossil Men"s watch features a off white dial with silver-toned hands and Roman numeral hour markers, fixed stainless steel bezel and a stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Quartz movement with analog display. Round case shape with a 38 mm case diameter. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Functions: Chronograph, Hour, Minute, Second. Water resistance up to 50 meters

name: Citizen Mens Quartz Watch
description: Gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet. Fixed gold-tone stainless steel bezel. Black dial with gold-tone hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Day of the week and date display at the 3 o"clock position. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Solid case back. Round case shape, case size: 39.5 mm, case thickness: 9 mm. Deployment with push button release clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: date, day, hour, minute, second. Dress watch style. Watch label: Japan Movt. Citizen Quartz Black Dial Mens Watch BF0582-51F

name: Citizen Quartz Mens Watch BI1041-31E
description: With a black face with date display framed by silver toned bezel and case its look is chic and refined, while the addition of the comfortable black polyurethane strap adds to the practicality of this versatile watch

name: Seiko Quartz SSB377P1
description: This Seiko watch has a case made of stainless steel with a diameter of 41.5 mm and is fitted with a metal band. Inside the case lies a Seiko movement and the watch features a Hardlex crystal crystal

name: Citizen Mens Quartz Chronograph Gold
description: Mens conventional battery operated with 24-hour indicator, 60-minute chronograph and date of month feature (not perpetual), yellow gold tone ion plated stainless steel case, mineral glass crystal, yellow gold tone ion plated stainless steel crown and push buttons, stainless steel screw down caseback (room for engraving), yellow gold tone ion plated stainless steel bracelet with push button fold over clasp, black tone dial, yellow gold tone 60-minute chronograph hand (9:00 position, no luminous), yellow gold tone applied hour indices with luminous

name: Guess Phoenix Black Silicone Mens Watch
description: The Guess Phoenix Black Silicone Mens Watch is an excellent product of the American watch brand - Guess. With a sporty, masculine and luxurious design, this watch is suitable for all mens fashion styles

name: Seiko 5 Sports Automatic SRPD53K1 - Ditur
description: Japanese Seiko watches are known for their very high technology. More than 100 years old, Seiko has pioneered the watch making industry with a number of innovations, including the first quartz watch and kinetic technology. Seiko watches combine elegance with unparalleled product development

name: Lorus Watches RRX25JX9
description: Mens Lorus RRX25JX9 watch is a unique complement to your closet. The use of solid color by the designers is a treatment that definitely affects the overall design of this model. The bracelet made of stainless steel adds a jewelry-like character to the watch and allows it to fit easily on any wrist

name: Seiko Chronograph SSB399P1
description: This quartz watch from the Seiko SPORT collection is full of useful features. Indeed, its deep black dial houses the three counters characteristic of chronographs and is surrounded by a tachymeter bezel. This model is made entirely of stainless steel with a carbonised titanium coating and is also very robust with its hardlex glass, screwed down case back and water resistance to 100 metres.

name: Seiko 5 Sports Automatic SRPD55K1 - Ditur
description: SEIKO’s iconic watch collection, the SEIKO 5 series was first introduced in 1963 and has been an integral part of the SEIKO watch family ever since. 2019 sees the SEIKO 5 series take on a new modern look, and a new SEIKO 5 logo, but this robust collection maintains the hallmarks of the very first watch range

name: Seiko Coutura SSB433 Men Steel
description: From the Coutura Collection. Delivering the perfect blend of technology and design for those on the move, the Coutura Collection combines bold angularity and shading with superior timekeeping for effortless sport/dress style. Crafted of stainless steel, this dynamic watch includes a sapphire crystal, screwdown caseback, tri-fold push button release clasp and classic cabochon crown.

name: Seiko SSC218P Le Grand Sport Solar Alarm
description: The Seiko SSC218P Le Grand Sport Solar Alarm Gents Watch is a modern piece with the reliability and functionality of a classic watch. Apart of the Le Grand Sport Collection and operated by solar power, the chronograph piece features a thick charcoal stainless steel casing with gold-toned features. The stylish black dial includes three sub dials, including an alarm, which can be adjusted to a second time zone, and a date window and stop watch

name: Seiko Solar Chronograph Black Dial Gold-tone
description: Gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet. Fixed gold-tone bezel. Black dial with gold-tone hands and Roman numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 60 second, 60 minute and a 12 hour alarm. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 44 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 22 mm. Deployment with push button clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second, chronograph. Dress watch style. Watch label: Japan Movt. Seiko Solar Chronograph Black Dial Gold-tone Stainelss Steel Mens Watch SSC196.

name: Seiko Chronograph SSB379
description: Seiko Chronograph SSB379P1 is a watch model for men, impressing with its strong and convenient 6-needle sports dial. Black dial is an endless source of inspiration. The tachymeter function helps measure the wearers movement speed over a certain distance. There are as many watch models as there are.

name: Seiko 5 Sports Automatic SRPD61K1 - Ditur
description: This Seiko watch has a case made of stainless steel with a diameter of 42.5 mm and is fitted with a metal band. Inside the case lies a Seiko movement and the watch features a Mineral crystal. The watch is 10 ATM. This means the watch is suitable for swimming.

name: Lorus Mens Bracelet Watch RXN77DX9
description: Add a new lease of life to your look with this mens dress watch from Lorus. Featuring a superb analogue blue face in a 39mm diameter 8mm thick case. Also boasting the well know Lorus features, including Day and Date Window, Mineral Crystal, Push/Pull Crown and Water-Resistant. With a fully adjustable stainless steel bracelet. This watch is water resistant up to 30 metres. All this with a 12-month Rubicon (International) warranty for extra peace of mind

name: Alba Womens Fashion Quartz Watch
description: This Seiko 5 Sports “SKX” GMT 42.5mm remains true to the brand’s dedication to durability and reliability. It features a blue dial with luminescent hands and indices, a date window at 3 o’clock and an additional red GMT hand that allows for the tracking of an additional timezone. Housed in a stainless steel case with a bicolour bezel that separates day and night hours and fitted on a rice steel bracelet that is iconic to the SKX.
